001package edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.pojo;
002
003import androidx.room.Relation;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.Pattern;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.Row;
006import java.util.List;
007
008/**
009 * This POJO is a class that allows for a multi-table join allowing me to recall the {@code rows}
010 * associated with a particular {@link Pattern} instance. It is not an entity, but it allows for
011 * more complicated queries without complicated SQL code.
012 */
013public class PatternWithRows extends Pattern {
014
015  @Relation(entity = Row.class, entityColumn = "pattern_id", parentColumn = "pattern_id")
016  private List<RowWithStitches> rows;
017
018  /**
019   * This getter gets the {@link List} of {@code rows} associated with a particular
020   * {@link Pattern}.
021   */
022  public List<RowWithStitches> getRows() {
023    return rows;
024  }
025
026  /**
027   * This setter sets the {@link List} of {@code rows} associated with a particular
028   * {@link Pattern}.
029   */
030  public void setRows(List<RowWithStitches> rows) {
031    this.rows = rows;
032  }
033}
